title: how stupid is this game?
body: Made an all bot game.... just me and bot only no real people......... leaving the game might get you a banned????????? like wtf is wrong with this game also on a side note when will they fix this dcing crap?

replies.body: You won't get banned.  That message just appears beause it is easier to have it coded to appear everytime someone attempts to quit a game, than chance it not appearing in a ranked or normal game and allow people to leave with no punishment.

1.) all bot game? You are clearly still new and need to play a bit more till it will allow you to
     go to pvp. It is to make sure you at least know what you are doing before hand.
2.) leaving can get you banned. But only if you are known to do it constantly. Leaving puts
     your team at a crazy disadvantage.
3.) Also the dc issue might be your network not handling it to well.

Made a custom  and picked 9 bots 4 on my team 5 on the other to play with so yes they were all bot this isn't my first account I know what I'm talking about so don't understand why you can get banned for leaving bots in mid game..... The whole reason for me playing bots and not people was cause I had to go to work soon and didn't want to fuck my team over and leave half way  also my internet is fine has to be the games servers or something
